StoryText: I am supposed to work today but I am feeling a bit sick.
Question: What should I do?

OptionText.Text: Take some medicine and go into work.

OptionResult.Result: My boss %FullName:NPC:3% sees I am sick and gets mad at me for showing up and sends me home.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:3% tells me I shouldn't try coming into work when I'm sick, I can get others sick. %Pron:3:1% sends me home. I get home and after all that moving around, going to work, coming back, I am out of breath. It's too much for me in this state and I am worse off than before.

OptionResult.Result: %FullName:NPC:3% gets mad at me for calling out and not trying to cover my shift.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Wow, I didn't think %FullName:NPC:3% would actually get mad at me for not covering my shift. I called out and wasn't thinking too clearly, it wasn't on the top of my priority list to call someone to cover me. What is %Pron:3:3% problem?!

OptionResult.Result: %FullName:NPC:1% covers my shift and I stay home and rest.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:3% is happy I got someone to cover my shift and views me as being very responsible. %FullName:NPC:1% is happy to take the shift too since %Pron:1:1% was looking to work more. And I'm happy to just rest at home and try to sleep this sickness away. I'm already feeling better.

OptionResult.Result: %FullName:NPC:2% can't work the shift so I go into work anyway.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: After %FullName:NPC:2% can't work my shift I just go into work. I tell my boss %FullName:NPC:3% and %Pron:3:1% appreciates me trying but tells me I should just go home and rest. Everyone is impressed that I still tried to go into work feeling the way I do, but now I feel worse than before.
